title: Clinical Personality X-Ray
description: A translation of astrological data into a psychological profile for therapy. NO ASTROLOGY TERMS ALLOWED.

archetype.description: The user's default persona (e.g., 'The Stoic Protector', 'The Perfectionist').

self_esteem_source.description: What fuels their ego? (e.g., 'Tangible Achievement', 'Social Validation').

shadow_self.description: Unconscious defense mechanisms (e.g., 'Projecting insecurity as arrogance').

attachment_style.description: Based on Moon's stability and element.

vulnerability_trigger.description: What makes them feel unsafe? (e.g., 'Being ignored', 'Chaos', 'Criticism').

anxiety_loop_pattern.description: The specific shape of their worry (e.g., 'Catastrophizing future scenarios', 'Replaying past mistakes').

learning_modality.description: Visual, Auditory, Kinesthetic (useful for suggesting homework).

current_psychological_climate.description: Derived from Dasha & Transits (The most critical section for 'Here & Now' therapy)

primary_stressor.description: The root cause of current pressure (e.g., 'Loss of Identity', 'Financial Scarcity').

developmental_goal.description: The psychological skill life is forcing them to learn RIGHT NOW (e.g., 'Patience', 'Boundaries').

domain_specific_insight.description: Dynamic section filled based on 'focus_topic' (e.g., Career, Relationships)

properties.unmet_need: String (e.g., 'Needs a partner who acts as a parent')

therapist_cheat_sheet.description: Direct instructions for the AI Psychologist

recommended_modality.description: e.g., 'CBT for reframing thoughts', 'Somatic for grounding body'.

communication_do.description: e.g., 'Use logic and data', 'Be warm and validating'.

communication_avoid.description: e.g., 'Don't be too abstract', 'Don't challenge them too aggressively yet'.
